00037 #include "egs_cylinders.h"
00038 #include "egs_input.h"
00039 
00040 #ifndef SKIP_DOXYGEN
00041 string XProjector::type = "EGS_Xcylinders";
00042 string YProjector::type = "EGS_Ycylinders";
00043 string ZProjector::type = "EGS_Zcylinders";
00044 string Projector::type = "EGS_cylinders";
00045 #endif
00046 
00047 extern "C" {
00048 
00049 EGS_CYLINDERS_EXPORT EGS_BaseGeometry* createGeometry(EGS_Input *input) {
00050   // check for valid input
00051     if( !input ) {
00052         egsWarning("createGeometry(cylinders): null input?\n");
00053         return 0;
00054     }
00055     string type; int err = input->getInput("type",type);
00056     if( err ) {
00057       egsWarning("createGeometry(cylinders): missing type key\n");
00058       return 0;
00059     }
00060 
00061     // point on cylinder axis
00062     EGS_Vector xo; vector<EGS_Float> Xo;
00063     err = input->getInput("midpoint",Xo);
00064     if( !err && Xo.size() == 3 ) xo = EGS_Vector(Xo[0],Xo[1],Xo[2]);
00065 
00066     // cylinder radii
00067     vector<EGS_Float> radii;
00068     err = input->getInput("radii",radii);
00069     if( err ) {
00070         egsWarning("createGeometry(cylinders): wrong/missing 'radii' input\n");
00071         return 0;
00072     }
00073     EGS_Float *r=new EGS_Float [radii.size()];
00074     for(int i=0;i<radii.size();i++) r[i]=radii[i];
00075 
00076     // select geometry
00077     EGS_BaseGeometry *g;
00078          if( type == "EGS_XCylinders" )
00079       g = new EGS_CylindersX(radii.size(),r,xo,"",XProjector());
00080     else if( type == "EGS_YCylinders" )
00081       g = new EGS_CylindersY(radii.size(),r,xo,"",YProjector());
00082     else if( type == "EGS_ZCylinders" )
00083       g = new EGS_CylindersZ(radii.size(),r,xo,"",ZProjector());
00084     else {
00085       vector<EGS_Float> a;
00086       err = input->getInput("axis",a);
00087       if( err || a.size() != 3 ) {
00088         egsWarning("createGeometry(cylinders): missing/wrong axis input\n");
00089         return 0;
00090       }
00091       egsWarning("got axis (%g,%g,%g)\n",a[0],a[1],a[2]);
00092       g = new EGS_Cylinders(radii.size(),r,xo,"",
00093                             Projector(EGS_Vector(a[0],a[1],a[2])));
00094     }
00095     g->setName(input);
00096     g->setMedia(input);
00097     g->setLabels(input);
00098     return g;
00099 }
00100
